class.name: UndoableEditEvent
class.javadoc:
An event indicating that an operation which can be undone has occurred.

Warning: Serialized objects of this class will not be compatible with future Swing releases. The current serialization support is appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running the same version of Swing. As of 1.4, support for long term storage of all JavaBeansTM has been added to the java.beans package. Please see {@link java.beans.XMLEncoder}. Ray Ryan
Constructs an UndoableEditEvent object. source the Object that originated the event (typically this) edit an UndoableEdit object

Returns the edit value.
the UndoableEdit object encapsulating the edit
